ComicInfo.Summary:
"Raising The Dead"(Part 2)
Danielle Baptiste, the newest bearer of the Witchblade, has some strange encounters with victims of Hurricane Katrina. After being drawn to New Orleans by ghostly images, Danielle is told by the undead, that she must bring them Madeline Desormeaux, whom they refer to as the mistress.
Also Sara is confronted by a foe from her past.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-15 09:48:54. [CVDB111149]
